import React, { Component } from 'react' import "../app.css"; const MenuItems = () => { function addItem() { let addBtn = document.getElementsByClassName("add-to-cart"); let itemName = document.getElementsByClassName("itemName"); let itemPrice = document.getElementsByClassName("itemPrice"); for(let i = 0; i < addBtn.length; i++) { let newOrderName = document.createElement("td"); let newOrderPrice = document.createElement("td"); let orderName = itemName[i] let orderPrice = itemPrice[i] addBtn[i].addEventListener("click", () => { newOrderName.textContent = orderName newOrderPrice.textContent = orderPrice }) } } return (
